metadata.title: CVE-2015-0240

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12

metadata.description: The Netlogon server implementation in smbd in Samba 3.5.x and 3.6.x before 3.6.25, 4.0.x before 4.0.25, 4.1.x before 4.1.17, and 4.2.x before 4.2.0rc5 performs a free operation on an uninitialized stack pointer, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted Netlogon packets that use the ServerPasswordSet RPC API, as demonstrated by packets reaching the _netr_ServerPasswordSet function in rpc_server/netlogon/srv_netlog_nt.c.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3 is installed
